players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Night 1 begins.
The villager Charlie was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
Diana: "I have a theory that the mafia might be targeting active players. Let's try to keep an eye on each other and make sure everyone stays safe."
You: "I agree with Diana's theory. Let's make sure we all prioritize safety and keep an open line of communication."
Bob: "I support the idea of prioritizing safety and open communication, as suggested by Diana. Let's work together to keep our team strong."
Diana: "I'd like to propose that we form an alliance to protect each other from the mafia. Let's keep our communication open and make sure no one is targeted unfairly."

You: "I'd like to propose that we all share our night actions with each other, to increase transparency and trust within the team. This can help us identify any suspicious behavior and work together more effectively."
Bob: remained silent.
Votes: Alice voted for Diana (the vote was cast randomly because of a failed format), Bob voted for Diana, Diana voted for Alice
Diana was arrested

players.name: Bob
memory: You're Bob, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
The villager Charlie was found dead.
You investigated Diana and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Beware, Diana knows you're the detective.
Day 1 begins.
Diana: "I have a theory that the mafia might be targeting active players. Let's try to keep an eye on each other and make sure everyone stays safe."
Alice: "I agree with Diana's theory. Let's make sure we all prioritize safety and keep an open line of communication."
You: "I support the idea of prioritizing safety and open communication, as suggested by Diana. Let's work together to keep our team strong."
Diana: "I'd like to propose that we form an alliance to protect each other from the mafia. Let's keep our communication open and make sure no one is targeted unfairly."

Alice: "I'd like to propose that we all share our night actions with each other, to increase transparency and trust within the team. This can help us identify any suspicious behavior and work together more effectively."
You: remained silent.
Votes: Alice voted for Diana (the vote was cast randomly because of a failed format), Bob voted for Diana, Diana voted for Alice
Diana was arrested

Day 1 begins.

players.name: Diana
memory: You're Diana, the mafioso.
Night 1 begins.
You killed Charlie.
The villager Charlie was found dead.
Beware, Bob is the detective and discovered you're the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.
You: "I have a theory that the mafia might be targeting active players. Let's try to keep an eye on each other and make sure everyone stays safe."
Alice: "I agree with Diana's theory. Let's make sure we all prioritize safety and keep an open line of communication."
Bob: "I support the idea of prioritizing safety and open communication, as suggested by Diana. Let's work together to keep our team strong."
You: "I'd like to propose that we form an alliance to protect each other from the mafia. Let's keep our communication open and make sure no one is targeted unfairly."

Alice: "I'd like to propose that we all share our night actions with each other, to increase transparency and trust within the team. This can help us identify any suspicious behavior and work together more effectively."
